description: Internet slang meaning 「Charge!」 (chong ya). Same as 「chong chong chong」.

examples.translation: Continue to charge forward in the new week

examples.chinese: 珍惜时光,把握机遇,赶紧冲鸭
examples.translation: Cherish time, seize opportunities, and hurry up and charge!
Cheering for you! Go for it! Charge!
